name: Museum Heist (itch) (TimothyJ, Haiyoooo | Game Designer & Artist, Evelynisbae, Chaki Behappy)
name_original: Museum Heist (itch) (TimothyJ, Haiyoooo | Game Designer & Artist, Evelynisbae, Chaki Behappy)
description:
Avoid being caught by security guards while attempting to steal priceless treasures from a museum. Will you be able to avoid capture and escape with the treasure or will you get caught and regret making thievery your career?

Team:

  • Timothy J - Design, Programming, Team Leader
  • Chaki - 3D modeling, animation
  • Evelyn - Sound design
  • Haiyoooo - FX, Shader, Lighting
